title: Magus of Mystical Mayhem

fields.name: 🔥 Phlogiston:
fields.value: Applies Burn 5 to you for the rest of the battle.

fields.name: ❄️ Cryogen:
fields.value: Chills you, reducing your next attack by an amount equal to your remaining HP.

fields.name: ☁️ Atmosphere:
fields.value: Grants itself a 20% dodge chance for the rest of the battle.

desc:
*Too lazy to walk to the fridge, so he learned telekinesis instead.*

A highly dangerous monster with relatively low HP. You might be tempted to immediately chuck damaging items at him, but be careful. Every battle item you use will result in him immediately retaliating with a random use of an elemntal material.
